abstract.text: Returns an array of all subviews that satisfy the given condition.
Removes all gesture recognizers of the specified type from the view.
Activates constraints that will fit the child to this view directly.
The current border color.
Creates a spacer view with optional dimensions and background color.
Scales the current view to fit its frame into its superview.
Makes a single grabber like view at the top of the view.
Finds and returns the first responder in the view hierarchy.
The current border width.
Resizes the view with a new CGSize. Returns itself for concatenation.

Embeds the view in a UIScrollView and applies edge constraints.
Activates a new set of constraints by removing an old list of constraints. The constraints to be removed can be defined or
the ones in the new list will be overriding the old ones.

Makes a shadow in the background of the view. Re-call this method once at every redraw to resize or re-color the effect.
Applies a corner radius to specific corners of the current view’s layer.
Frame in the view’s window coordinate.
Sets its corner radius as half of the current height.
Makes a gradient in the background of the view. Re-call this method once at every redraw to resize or re-color the effect.
Resizes the view with a new CGRect. Returns itself for concatenation.
Returns true if the given view is being rendered as right to left layout direction.

is provided, no constraint is set for it.
